about_the_game:
Cabral’s Quest is a pixel art puzzle game set in a hidden world underneath the wetlands, ancient homeland of the capybaras.

Make your way to each fragment of the sacred deed to help Cabral reclaim their land. Use different runes to change the elements of the world around you to solve each puzzle.

GOALS




RESCUE BABY CAPYBARAS
Baby capybaras are hidden across the world, lost after the occupation of their lands.
They're optional collectibles to prove your ability.

OBTAIN EACH FRAGMENT OF THE SACRED DEED
And help Cabral recover the land of his community.
Cross portals, doors or bridges and try to avoid the wildlife around to make your way to each fragment of the sacred deed.

CONCEPT


LOGICAL AND LATERAL THINKING
Set in a calm atmosphere, encouraging deep thinking in both logical and lateral ways.

SIMPLE MECHANICS
Based on the combination and switching of game elements’ colors, allowing for an accessible but rich gameplay.

4 UNIQUE WORLDS
Crafted with specific wildlife and natural elements that expand the original mechanics creating new experiences and puzzles.

MECHANICS




RUNES
Use the runes to modify the elements of the world, changing their color and disabling them to solve the puzzles.

COLOR-BASED BEHAVIOUR
Each element and enemy has different behaviour, and color is always at the core of each mechanic.

Use portals, doors, bridges and other elements to move around the levels.

Avoid the corrupted wildlife that will make your way to the sacred deed harder.
